mapper.sql: id, seal_id, is_pay, pay_way, pay_accout, pay_date, express_way, courier_id, memo
mapper.select:
select
from seal_pay_order where seal_id = #{sealId,jdbcType=CHAR} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into seal_pay_order (id, seal_id, is_pay, pay_way, pay_accout, pay_date, express_way, courier_id, memo) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sealId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isPay,jdbcType=BIT}, #{payWay,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{payAccout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expressWay,jdbcType=BIT}, #{courierId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update seal_pay_order

is_pay = #{isPay,jdbcType=BIT},
pay_way = #{payWay,jdbcType=CHAR},

courier_id = #{courierId,jdbcType=CHAR},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
